TopicTitle: Mods that encourage more use of automation/kOS? Also maybe making things a little more realistic?

Articles.Content:
Hey y'all, I've been playing KSP for close to half a decade now and now I'm working on my Aerospace Engineering degree. I've grown very fond of the Kerbal OS mod and recently added SCANsat and RemoteTech as enhancements to my experience. I'm looking for more mods that encourage me to increase my reliance on kOS and those other mods, and maybe making my missions a little more realistic (Not mods like Principia or RSS but ones that reduce the gamification of space missions, if that makes sense). I'm looking at adding Unmanned Before Manned for one.

Current Modlist in spoiler:

Failure mods maybe, it forces redundancy, escape systems, etc.  I use my own Less Real Test Flight (a TestFlight add-on for stock-ish games) but there are tons out there so finding one that fits your gaming style shouldn't be too difficult.

It's still in 'beta' mostly because it needs a good optimization pass, but otherwise it's basically done.
